cause.description:
It's not easy to be diagnosed with any thyroid problem, and when you are many people don't understand what you go through on a day to day basis. I'm hoping to start a base of support for those who have a thyroid problem, and to raise awareness so the people around them can get a basic knowledge of what is going on. Links

1. Raise Awareness 2. Provide a Support Base
cause.mission: Raise Awareness Of Thyroid Diseases, and Create a Support Base For Those Who Have It.
cause.name: Thyroid Awareness & Support
